assignments.description: Add all the related visit report building project records for each building project defined in the Add projects screen to the record collection list
assignments.name: AddRelatedBuildingProjectAssocList
assignments.label: AddRelatedBuildingProjectAssocList

assignments.description: Add Related Contacts from Visit Report to list
assignments.name: AddRelatedContactsToList
assignments.label: AddRelatedContactsToList

assignments.description: For each iteration, assign contact to the visit report
assignments.name: Assign_associated_Contacts
assignments.label: Assign associated Contacts

assignments.description: Assign each associated Building project, given by the user previously in the screen, to a record variable that stores Related Visit Report Building projects Object records.
assignments.name: AssignAssociatedBuildingProject
assignments.label: AssignAssociatedBuildingProject

assignments.description: Assing the associate opportunity from the lookup list
assignments.name: AssignAssocOpportunity
assignments.label: AssignAssocOpportunity

Flow.description: Fixed User Relation assignment- Run without sharing- Kurtis
Flow.label: Visit Report - Create Report

loops.description: Iterate though the internal users given in the Screenflow
loops.name: LoopThruInteralUsers
loops.label: LoopThruInteralUsers

recordCreates.description: From the list , create the corresponding Visit Report Related Contacts
recordCreates.name: Create_Visit_Report_Related_Contacts
recordCreates.label: Create Visit Report Related Contacts

recordCreates.description: Create the Visit report from the information provided in the previous screen. Use this record later in the flow
recordCreates.name: CreateVisitReportInitial
recordCreates.label: CreateVisitReport

recordCreates.description: At the end of loop , create all the Visit Report Related User Records from the list
recordCreates.name: CreateVisitReportRelatedUserRecord
recordCreates.label: CreateVisitReportRelatedUserRecord

screens.description: Error message that is displayed to user
screens.name: errorText
screens.label: errorText

variables.description: counts the number of Building projects already related
variables.name: Counter

variables.description: Counts the amount of opportunites created after each iteration
variables.name: CountOpp

variables.description: Store Contacts from Screen Visit Report
variables.name: RelatedContacts

variables.description: Contacts related to the visit report. There can be multiple contacts chosen to be related to a visit report. These are chosen in the screen input by user. Each record will be added to a list
variables.name: VisitReportRelatedContacts

variables.description: Can be internal or external users
variables.name: VisitReportRelatedUsers

variables.description: Add the records to a list
variables.name: VisitReportRelatedUsersList
